name: zol
description: Type safe composable SQL abstraction layer

scripts.lint: tslint -c ../../tslint.json --type-check --project ./src/tsconfig.json -t codeFrame && tslint -c ../../tslint.json --type-check --project ./tests/tsconfig.json -t codeFrame && tslint -c ../../tslint.json --type-check --project ./benchmarks/tsconfig.json -t codeFrame
scripts.build: tsc --project src && rollup -c && ts-node ../../tools/dts-merge.ts ./build/types/zol.d.ts -o ./dist/types/zol.d.ts && node ../../tools/build-docs.js dist/types/zol.d.ts -o dist/docs

author: benny-medflyt <benny@medflyt.com>
